about_the_game:
Protect your healer and draw foes' attention in this single-player roguelite action RPG that turns tanking into a unique, fast-paced experience. Block, dodge and take as much damage as you can to survive the Isles of Doom!

Hold your foes' attention

Damage your enemies to hold their attention! Or force them to attack you by running away!
Don't Lose Aggro lets you play any kind of tank you can think of.

Your Healer

You have the assignment of saving a novice healer that splash heals you but also all your enemies.
You have to protect her nonetheless! Or do you?
Don't Lose Aggro allows you to choose whether to protect the healer or sacrifice her for your own egoistic agenda.

Abilities

Use your abilities to utilize the tank you aim to become. Charge can close a gap between you and the enemy but if you're the slower type, you can always pull them towards you!
Some abilities are aggressive and focus on damage, whilst others focus on protection and healing.

Progression

Upgrade your lasting tanking builds by spending talent points to suit your preferred playstyle. Choose from aggressive, defensive or supportive playstyles of tank.

Isles of Doom

Each arena in Don't Lose Aggro has a special twist to gameplay.
As you progress, you'll unlock new arenas and fight new enemies & bosses to prove your tanking skills!

name: Don't Lose Aggro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Protect your healer and draw foes' attention in this single-player roguelite action RPG that turns tanking into a unique, fast-paced experience. Block, dodge and take as much damage as you can to survive the Isles of Doom!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
